title: Patch 9
content:
tch Bolt no longer needs you to pick a target and deals damage to all linked targets. Great Old One warlocks now have access to Phantasmal Force. Agonising Blast is now part of Eldritch Blast's initial damage. Cloud of Daggers and Moonbeam now remove Curse of Regret from targets. Minor Illusion is now only dispelled if an NPC passes a Perception check.

Story and Continuity
